name: Paul L. Maurizio
body:
### My Research
I am a Ph.D. Candidate in Bioinformatics and Computational Biology at UNC-Chapel Hill, working on modeling host genetic determinants of viral pathogenesis.

[Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=kO8RDP0AAAAJ)

[Valdar Lab](http://valdarlab.unc.edu/people.html)

[Heise Lab](https://unclineberger.org/people/mark-heise)

### Contact Me
[Linked In](https://www.linkedin.com/in/paulmaurizio)

[Research Gate](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Paul_Maurizio)

[Mendeley](https://www.mendeley.com/profiles/paul-maurizio/)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TweetNTD)

### A Simple GitHub Pages Tutorial
Check out Karl Broman's [tutorial] (http://kbroman.org/simple_site/) on how to set up a simple site using [git](http://git-scm.com/), [GitHub](http://github.com/), [Markdown] (https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/), and [Jekyll] (http://jekyllrb.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
